attributes.action: Ban the production use of un-recyclable plastic packaging in the United Kingdom
attributes.background: With councils pushing for greater recycling of household waste, it is unconscionable that the government still allows the production and use of un-recyclable plastics in product packaging which cannot be re-processed and goes into landfill.

rejection.details:
We think your petition is similar to the following petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167596

You may wish to consider signing this petition.
